lead_paragraph: Negotiations between the Tennessee Titans and their top draft pick, quarterback Vince Young of Texas, will begin face to face tomorrow, and Young’s agent said yesterday that he expects he would be signed in time for the start of training camp. “I’m pretty confident we’ll get it done,” the agent, Major Adams, said.
